title: Font ID
content:
Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080931im_/http:/typophile.com/files/anearly_5069.jpg)

 [‹ Airport Flight Arrivals & Departures Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080931/http:/typophile.com/node/44274 "Go to previous forum topic") [oui magazine font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080931/http:/typophile.com/node/44265 "Go to next forum topic")
author: byronpirro

comments.content: Whatever it is (hard to judge from the size of the sample) - it’s [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080931/http:/typophile.com/node/33713).

Here is another image, hope it helps,  
this one has been troubling me for a long  
time, it seems like a custom font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080931im_/http:/typophile.com/files/axes_6058.jpg)

Thanks Jan.

I looked all over MyFonts but could not find it.  
I wonder why Hoefler fonts are not shown on Myfonts.

H&FJ fonts can only be purchased from their site because they want it that way.  
Not all fonts out there are available at MyFonts.
